Constructor Detail

VirtualizationActionCommand

public VirtualizationActionCommand(User userIn,
                                   java.util.Date dateIn,
                                   ActionType actionTypeIn,
                                   Server targetSystemIn,
                                   java.lang.String uuidIn,
                                   java.util.Map contextIn)
Constructor

Parameters:
userIn - User performing the action
dateIn - Earliest execution date/time for the action
actionTypeIn - ActionType of the action being performed.
targetSystemIn - The host system for this action.
uuidIn - String representation of the target instance's UUID
contextIn - Map of optional action arguments.
Method Detail

store

public ValidatorError store()
                     throws UninitializedCommandException
Stores virtualization action to be picked up by the client.

Returns:
null ALWAYS!
Throws:
UninitializedCommandException - if the target system is null.

getAction

public Action getAction()
gets the action. Should return null before store() is called.

Returns:
the action

lookupActionType

public static ActionType lookupActionType(java.lang.String currentState,
                                          java.lang.String actionName)
Find the appropriate action label for a given action name and current state.

Parameters:
currentState - The current state of the instance
actionName - The name of the action the user wants to perform from the button on the form in the web UI.
Returns:
The ActionType of the (RHN) action that should be performed.
